trans-unit.source: Verifies that the user has permission to access the file requested.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollerer at brukeren har tilgang til den forespurte filen.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: This module provides authorization services against file-system access-control lists (ACLs).
trans-unit.target: Denne modulen inneholder godkjenning mot filsystemet tilgangskontroll lister (ACL).

trans-unit.source: When the `mode` attribute of the [authentication Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/27bc0ba9-f23a-45f3-ae42-dbe7916e3ee2) configuration element is set to `Windows` so that the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> is being used for the application, the FileAuthorizationModule module ensures that the requesting user is allowed read or write access to the resource, depending on the request verb, before executing the request.
trans-unit.target: Når den `mode` for den [godkjenning elementet (ASP.NET innstillingsskjemaet)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/27bc0ba9-f23a-45f3-ae42-dbe7916e3ee2) konfigurasjonselementet er satt til `Windows` slik at den <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>som brukes for programmet, FileAuthorizationModule modulen sikrer at brukeren som anmoder kan lese eller skrive tilgang til ressursen, avhengig av forespørselen verb før forespørselen kjøres.</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule.CheckFileAccessForUser%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se den <xref:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule.CheckFileAccessForUser%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule.CheckFileAccessForUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is not intended to be called from application code.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren skal ikke kalles fra programmet kode.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET calls this constructor to create an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule> class.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET kaller denne konstruktøren for å opprette en forekomst av <xref:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule>klassen.</xref:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule>

trans-unit.source: After calling the constructor, it calls the <xref:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule.Init%2A> method to initialize the new <xref:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule> object.
trans-unit.target: Etter kall til konstruktøren, kaller den <xref:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule.Init%2A>metode for å initialisere den nye <xref:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule>objektet.</xref:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule.Init%2A>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the user has access to the requested file.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om brukeren har tilgang til den forespurte filen.

trans-unit.source: The CheckFileAccessForUser method checks to see whether the current user, represented by a Windows access token, is granted access to the requested file in the file-system access-control lists (ACLs).
trans-unit.target: Metoden CheckFileAccessForUser kontrollerer om den gjeldende brukeren er representert av en Windows-tilgangstoken har fått tilgang til den forespurte filen fra filsystemet tilgangskontroll listen (ACL).

trans-unit.source: The virtual path is mapped to the physical file-system path before the check is made.
trans-unit.target: Den virtuelle banen er tilordnet til den fysiske filsystem banen før sjekken er utført.

trans-unit.source: If the HTTP verb used to make the request is `GET`, `POST`, or `HEAD`, the CheckFileAccessForUser method checks for read access to the file.
trans-unit.target: Hvis HTTP-verbet brukt til å gjøre forespørselen er `GET`, `POST`, eller `HEAD`, metoden CheckFileAccessForUser søker etter lesetilgang til filen.

trans-unit.source: If any other verb is used, the CheckFileAccessForUser method checks for read/write permission to the file.
trans-unit.target: Hvis andre verb brukes, kontrollerer metoden CheckFileAccessForUser for lese-/ skrivetilgang til filen.

trans-unit.source: **Security Note** If the <xref:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule> module is not defined in the `httpModules` configuration section for the application, the <xref:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule> module always returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: **Obs!** hvis den <xref:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule>modulen er ikke definert i den `httpModules` konfigurasjonsdelen for programmet, den <xref:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule>modulen returnerer alltid `true`.</xref:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule>

trans-unit.source: The virtual path to the file.
trans-unit.target: Den virtuelle banen til filen.

trans-unit.source: A Windows access token representing the user.
trans-unit.target: En Windows-tilgangstoken som representerer brukeren.

trans-unit.source: The HTTP verb used to make the request.
trans-unit.target: HTTP-verbet som brukes til å sende forespørselen.

trans-unit.source: if the current Windows user represented by token has access to the file using the specified HTTP verb or if the module is not defined in the application's configuration file; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: gjeldende Windows-bruker som er representert av token har tilgang til filen med det angitte HTTP-verbet eller hvis den modulen er ikke definert i programmets konfigurasjonsfil; ellers, .

trans-unit.source: virtualPath is .
trans-unit.target: virtualPathis .

trans-unit.source: -or- token is .
trans-unit.target: -or- token is .

trans-unit.source: -or- verb is .
trans-unit.target: -or- verb is .

trans-unit.source: virtualPath is not in the application directory structure of the Web application.
trans-unit.target: virtualPather ikke i mappestruktur for programmet på webprogrammet.

trans-unit.source: The file specified by virtualPath does not exist.
trans-unit.target: Filen fra virtualPath finnes ikke.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources, other than memory, used by the <xref href="System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Frigir alle ressurser enn minnet som brukes av den <xref href="System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended to be called from application code.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden skal ikke kalles fra programmet kode.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref href="System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer den <xref href="System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended to be called from application code.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden skal ikke kalles fra programmet kode.

trans-unit.source: The Init method ensures that the <xref:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule> is included in the processing of the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthorizeRequest> event.
trans-unit.target: Init-metoden sikrer at den <xref:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule>er inkludert i behandlingen av den <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthorizeRequest>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthorizeRequest> </xref:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule>

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication"> </xref> forekomsten.
